emuInput.TitMainTitle: Herman Brontz, Jack Baumgartner and Jack Miller, standing in Top Value Stamp Company booth with two people wearing plaid elephant costumes, in Syria Mosque for the 1956 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, page 19, reads: "1. Two animated "Thrifty" elephants highlighted the Top Value Stamp Company booth. Representatives Herman Brontz, Jack Baumgartner and Jack Miller chat in the background
